mapper.select: select r.memberID, l.licenseNum, l.qualification, l.takedate from personalMember r, license l where r.memberID = l.memberID and r.memberID = #{memberID} order by licenseNum ASC
mapper.insert: insert into license (licenseNum, qualification, takeDate, memberID) values ((select nvl(max(licenseNum),0)+1 from license), #{qualification}, #{takeDate}, #{memberID})
